page.title: 02* STEVENAGE *
page.content: Stevenage was a small North Hertford- shire{market town}The first settlement in Stevenage was possibly in{Roman} times as pottery,and burial mounds now called the Six Hills, have been found. The Six Hills lie beside what used to be the{Great North Road.}Stevenage was designated to be a{New Town}in 1946 by the New Towns Act it was built to relieve the housing problem in London.So Stevenage became the first New Town.In the New Town there is a traffic-free shopping centre and it is surrounded by six{neighbourhoods.} Houses were built by the Development Corporation.They also built neighbour_ hood shopping centres, community,and day centres,schools,pubs,churches and flats.Since then Stevenage has grown with the building of FAIRLANDS VALLEY PARK and the LEISURE CENTRE plus two industrial estates.
